entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 11:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: S 55 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Snow inland early this evening. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm except 50 mm inland and over higher terrain. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
